titleStmt.title: A margarite of America. By T. Lodge
titleStmt.author: Lodge, Thomas, 1558?-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by A. Jeffes] for Iohn Busbie, and are to be sold in S. Dunstons church-yard in Fleet-street at the little shop next Cliffords Inne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
